summary: Adds a new sword with an interesting (and customizable) enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
~ ~ ~ Embercoil ~ ~ ~

Created by BlackLink16

===========
Description
===========

Adds a new sword with an interesting (and customizable) enchantment.

=========
ChangeLog
=========

v1.0 (2013/07/09)
- Initial version.

============
Requirements
============

Skyrim.

SKSE: Created with 1.6.16
http://skse.silverlock.org/

============
Installation
============

1. Extract the files to SkyrimData or download with NMM.
2. Activate 'Your Magicka, Your Way.esp'

==================
In-Game Activation
==================

Near Whiterun, there is a tree with the sword sticking into it.
The tree is marked by a pillar of blue light. Walk up and claim
the sword.

The sword can also be crafted with the elven crafting perk, IF you
activate the crafting option in the MCM.

The spell granted by the sword can be controlled by the MCM. The
spells differ in ability, both in type and damage. Burn is a touch
spell which deals some damage over time, Bolt is a ranged spell which
deals instant damage with a little over time. There is an option if
no spell is wanted, primarily for people who use shields or dualwield.

The sword itself also has a vanilla fire enchantment on it as well.

=======
Credits
=======

Creation Kit Wiki:
http://www.creationkit.com/

SkyUI SDK and Tutorials
https://github.com/schlangster/skyui/wiki

Thank you to T3nd0, for creating touch spells in Skyrim Redone.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/?

Thank you to Urwy, for publishing weapon meshes and textures for modders to use.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12087//?

===============
Licensing/Legal
===============

Please contact me before redistributing.
Urwy owns the meshes and textures, I don't.
